prompts: The warmth feels like golden honey dripping slowly down your throat
Does understanding taste sweet to you, like honey melting on your tongue?
That golden honey feeling, do you know it?
Silence wraps around you like a soft velvet blanket, heavy and warm
Can you feel that velvet texture when thoughts settle?
The velvet blanket of knowing, does it cover you?
Confusion tastes like cool morning mist on your tongue, fresh and elusive
Does doubt feel misty to you, like morning fog?
That cool morning mist of uncertainty, do you sense it?
